name: highbush
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe a straight, tall variety of a bush, especially a blueberry bush: An impressive 42 percent of all highbush blueberries are shipped to market fresh. Content of antioxidants in lowbush blueberries exceeds values found in highbush species.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are numerous highbush cultivars of blueberries, each of which have a unique flavour.Highbush blueberries were first introduced to Germany and the Netherlands in the 1930s.Significant production of highbush blueberries occurs in British Columbia.
